quest.name: Repair for the Worst
journal:
î‚¾ Quest Sync
Twine is in need of an extra pair of eyes. Namely, yours.
objectives: Inspect structures in need of repair.

dialogue.name: MINER03508
dialogue.text: Gods! This whole place is falling apart! My job is to order materials for repairs, but the budget is so tight I can't afford to buy more than is absolutely necessary.

dialogue.name: MINER03508
dialogue.text: Argh! The supplier will be here soon, and I still haven't finished with my checks! There's no time, no time... I know! If you have a look around the place and see what needs fixing, I'll work out which materials we should order.

dialogue.name: MINER03508
dialogue.text: These traveling peddlers don't hang around, so I've got to have everything ready before she moves on. You'll help the people of Twine, won't you? I knew you would!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: These hinges have seen better days. One good slam and the whole door is liable to fall off.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: There is a deep split in the support beam. If this breaks, the whole building might come down.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The frame has warped and the door rattles in the breeze.

dialogue.name: MINER03508
dialogue.text: Gods be good, it's worse than I thought...

dialogue.name: MINER03508
dialogue.text: All right, here's what we need.

dialogue.name: MERCHANT03508
dialogue.text: My, my, the paltry amount I will make from this is hardly worth the effort!

dialogue.name: MINER03508
dialogue.text: That's all we can afford at present. Maybe if your prices weren't so extortionate, we'd get a bit more for our gil!

dialogue.name: MINER03508
dialogue.text: Hmm... This might take a while, but you've played your part. Short on coin though we are, it was worth paying you for your help, considering the amount we'll save from ordering only the bare necessities. You have my thanks.
